author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Mix together all of the ingredients thoroughly and mould around three skewers. Heat the oil in a frying pan and cook the lamb skewers for 1-2 minutes to seal on all sides. Place into the oven for ten minutes, until golden and cooked through. Serve with a herb salad.
ingredients: 250g/8¾oz lamb mince,  ½ leek, chopped,  handful breadcrumbs,  ½ tsp paprika,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  ½ tsp ginger,  1 free-range egg yolk,  1 tbsp oil,  herb salad, to serve
